metadata.description: Example protocol demonstrating AI visual navigation

actions.description: Use AI vision to locate and click the login button. Falls back to center of screen if not found.

params.task: Find and click the username input field
params.goal: Focus the username field for input

actions.description: Locate the username input field using AI vision
Type username into the focused field

params.task: Find and click the password input field
params.goal: Focus the password field for input

actions.description: Locate the password input field using AI vision
Type password into the focused field

params.task: Click the submit button to log in

actions.description: Find and click the submit button. Falls back to expected button location if not found.
